title: RT News - October 20, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: A sixth consecutive night of protests grip Barcelona, as pro-indepedence activists vent their anger over the jailing of separatist leaders. Brexit could be delayed again as the UK parliament forces Boris Johnson to send a letter to the EU asking for an extension. Although the PM doesn't sign it, and tells them a further postponement would be damaging. Donald Trump takes credit for Turkey pausing its offensive against the Kurds in Syria. But Ankara points at the fine print saying it's not the 'ceasefire' Washington is claiming.
description: A sixth consecutive night of protests grip Barcelona, as pro-indepedence activists vent their anger over the jailing of separatist leaders
